verses.text: Praise ye the \+w LORD|strong="H3050"\+w*. Praise the \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*, O my soul.
While I live will I praise the \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*: I will sing praises unto my God while I have any being.
Put not your trust in princes, norin the son of man, in whom there isno help.
His breath goeth forth, he returneth to his earth; in that very day his thoughts perish.
Happy is hethat haththe God of Jacob for his help, whose hope isin the \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*his God:
Which made heaven, and earth, the sea, and all that therein is:which keepeth truth for ever:
Which executeth judgment for the oppressed: which giveth food to the hungry. The \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*looseth the prisoners:
The \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*openeth the eyes ofthe blind: the \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*raiseth them that are bowed down: the \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*loveth the righteous:
The \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*preserveth the strangers; he relieveth the fatherless and widow: but the way of the wicked he turneth upside down.
The \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*shall reign for ever, eventhy God, O Zion, unto all generations. Praise ye the \+w LORD|strong="H3050"\+w*.
